parameters.name: Visible
parameters.description: True if leader is displayed, false if not (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Multiple
parameters.description: True if multiple leaders are displayed, false if not

title: ICallout.GetLeader
description: Gets the leader properties of the callout.
signature:
System.Boolean GetLeader( 
   out System.Boolean
Visible
,
   out System.Boolean
Multiple
)

parameters.name: Visible
parameters.description: True if leader is displayed, false if not (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Multiple
parameters.description: True if multiple leaders are displayed, false if not

remarks:
If Visible is false, then
ICallout::TargetStyle
is swCalloutTargetStyle_None.
